title: Ep192: Jack of All Heauxs (Ft. Dante Nero)
itunes:title: Ep192: Jack of All Heauxs (Ft. Dante Nero)
description:
On this week’s episode of WHOREible Decisions Mandii & Weezy are joined by relationship guru & podcaster, Dante Nero. The conversation becomes an immediate battle of the sexes! How long should sex last? We discuss how long is TOO LONG for a sex session and our preference. Our guest shares his sex tip in the bedroom before we discuss the Heaux fact of the week. Can you guess the Guinness world record of the most children birthed by one woman? You won’t believe it! 


The Jack of all Heauxs, Dante Nero shares his journey of sex through pimping, poly and building different relationships with women before marriage. Tons of gems dropped in this week’s episode! Enjoy!


Follow this week’s guest 

Twitter @DanteNero

Visit his website Manschool202.com


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages 

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod 


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode! 


Want more? Bonus episodes, merch and more Whoreible Decisions!! Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
